scripts.android-prod: npm test && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && npm run android-sourcemaps
scripts.android-dev: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
scripts.ios-prod: npm test && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ios/main.jsbundle.map && npm run ios-sourcemaps
scripts.ios-dev: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev true --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle && react-native run-ios
